full_sentence: I just cant cope with this fucking wild transgender stuff
Please stop doing that puffing your cheeks out face and showing us a glimpse of what's up your nostrils. It's really grossing me out.

When the boss retired, he got replaced by a woman. Suddenly we were having meetings every morning and little work was ever discussed. On top of that, having two or three planning meetings every week to talk about what we planned to do. It got to the point where we had so many meetings to talk about work that we never actually had any time to do any of the actual work.
